long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Love Cats? Discover Meowledge!
Meowledge is a fun, lightweight browser extension that brings joy and whimsy to your browsing experience with a rotating cute cat and interesting cat facts at the click of a button.


FEATURES
>Cute Rotating Cat: Enjoy a delightful rotating cat animation that brings a smile to your face every time you open a new tab or click the extension icon.
>Cat Facts: Discover fascinating and fun facts about cats with just one click. Learn something new about your feline friends every day!


UPCOMING FEATURES
>Custom Cats: Personalize your experience with a variety of adorable cat animations to choose from. Coming soon!
>Cat Sound Effects: Add a playful touch to your browsing with charming cat sounds.


HOW TO USE MEOWLEDGE
>Add the extension to your Chrome browser.
>Click the Meowledge icon and the cat will generate a fun fact for you.
>Enjoy!
NOTE: Have some patience. Sometimes, it might take a bit to generate the fact. Till then have fun with the cat.

FEEDBACK AND BUG REPORTS
If you're having issues or found a bug, please don't post the bug report here. Contact us directly so we can fix it: pratyushk.dev@gmail.com.

ENJOYING MEOWLEDGE? PLEASE RATE US!
If you're not fully satisfied, please contact us at pratyushk.dev@gmail.com and we'll make sure to help. We love hearing from our users and making Meowledge better for everyone!
